COMMENT_TX: 1:02 delay before start of game for rain and snow

ej,nuxhj101,P,hurle901,Intentional HBP ej,rignb101,M,runge901,Arguing about warning ej,tannc101,P,runge901,Throwing towel on field (no longer in game) $Pitcher Nuxhall ejected by 2B umpire Hurley for intentionally hitting Cash; Angels manager Rigney then ejected by HP umpire Runge for arguing about receiving a warning; finally Angel Tanner, no longer in game ejected by Runge for throwing towel on field
ej,scheb101,M,nappl901,Intentional HBP $Phil Regan fined $50 by HP Umpire Larry Napp for intentionally hitting Jim Pagliaroni; Tigers Manager Bob Scheffing ejected by Napp arguing the ruling
Whitey Ford left with injured left shoulder

ej,hitcb101,M,flahr901,Catch/no catch call (Shoved umpire) $Russ Snyder jumped at the fence and the ball hit glove's heel and poppped straight up in air; Snyder caught it on the way down but 2B umpire Red Flaherty ruled the ball struck the wall; Orioles Manager Billy Hitchcock ejected by Flaherty
Jerry Walker left with strained shoulder muscle
ej,colar101,P,nappl901,Called third strike (Threw bat) Rocky Colavito ejected by HP umpire Larry Napp
ej,hitcb101,M,berrc103,Call at 1B $Orioles manager Hitchcock ejected by 1B umpire Berry for arguing that Snyder was safe at 1st
ej,lopea102,M,berrc103,Call at 2B $Nellie Fox thought he tagged Bill Bruton when Bruton overslid 2B; White Sox Manager Al Lopez ejected by 2B umpire Charlie Berry
$Al Kaline's throw skipped past 3B; HP umpire Ed Runge ruled obstruction on Steve Boros preventing Vic Power from scoring
$Game 1 of scheduled double header; game 2 rained out after teams played 2 1/2 shutout innings
$Bill Bruton and Al Kaline collide; Bruton left with fractured jaw
ej,laryf101,P,runge901,Bench jockeying $Tigers pitcher Lary (not in game) ejected by HP umpire Runge for bench jockeying at unknown point in game
